metadata.feature_description: Performs operations on multiple files or folders simultaneously with progress tracking

steps.action: Navigated to Assets panel and opened Images folder
steps.expected: Should see checkboxes or multi-select controls to select multiple files
steps.actual: No checkboxes or multi-select UI controls visible. Only single-item selection is supported.

steps.action: Attempted Ctrl+Click on files to enable multi-select
steps.expected: Should select multiple files when Ctrl+clicking
steps.actual: Ctrl+Click triggered file download instead of selection. Multi-select not supported.

steps.action: Attempted Shift+Click on files for range selection
steps.expected: Should select a range of files with Shift+Click
steps.actual: Shift+Click triggered file download instead of range selection. Range selection not supported.

issues: Multi-select functionality is not available in the PersonaBar Assets UI. No checkboxes, Ctrl+Click, or Shift+Click selection is supported.

steps.action: Attempted to select multiple files for bulk deletion
steps.expected: Should be able to select multiple files and delete them in one operation
steps.actual: Multi-select not available. Only single-item delete is supported via hover menu.

issues: Bulk delete is not available because multi-select is not implemented in the UI. Only individual file/folder deletion is supported.

steps.action: Attempted to select multiple files for bulk move operation
steps.expected: Should be able to select multiple files and move them to a destination folder
steps.actual: Multi-select not available. Only single-item move is supported.

issues: Bulk move is not available because multi-select is not implemented. Single-item move dialog works correctly.

steps.action: Attempted to select multiple files for bulk copy operation
steps.expected: Should be able to select multiple files and copy them to a destination folder
steps.actual: Multi-select not available. Only single-item copy is supported.

issues: Bulk copy is not available because multi-select is not implemented. Single-item copy dialog works correctly.

steps.action: Hovered over CTA-1.jpg file and clicked Move icon
steps.expected: Should display move dialog with folder picker
steps.actual: Move dialog appeared with 'MOVE FOLDER TO (SELECT A DESTINATION)' title, folder tree, search box, and Move/Cancel buttons

steps.action: Hovered over CTA-2.jpg file and clicked Copy icon
steps.expected: Should display copy dialog with folder picker
steps.actual: Copy dialog appeared with 'COPY FILE TO (SELECT A DESTINATION)' title, folder tree showing all available destinations, and Copy/Cancel buttons

steps.action: Hovered over FolderToMove folder and clicked Delete icon
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog appeared with warning icon asking 'Are you sure you want to delete the folder FolderToMove?' with Cancel and Delete buttons

steps.expected: Dialog should close without deleting folder
steps.actual: Dialog closed and folder remained in the list

observations: The PersonaBar Assets UI does not have multi-select functionality. There are no checkboxes on items, Ctrl+Click does not enable multi-select, and Shift+Click does not enable range selection.
Code analysis reveals that bulk operations API exists in the legacy DigitalAssetsPro module (DeleteItems endpoint accepting arrays of items) but this is not exposed in the PersonaBar Assets UI.
Individual file/folder operations (Edit, Move, Copy, Download, Delete) are available via hover menu icons and work correctly.
Folder deletion effectively acts as a bulk operation since it deletes all contents, but this is implicit rather than explicit multi-select.
The feature description mentions 'progress tracking' but no progress indicators were observed since bulk operations are not available.
